components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to AWCC Network in Afghanistan

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to AWCC Network in Afghanistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: Flex Insights Dashboard Not loading for a Subset of Customers

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate the issue related to Flex Insights for a subset of customers. Customers may see an error banner when viewing dashboards and reports within Flex and the Analytics Portal, and may see that no data is being loaded when viewing or editing dashboards and reports. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate the issue related to Flex Insights for a subset of customers. Customers may see an error banner when viewing dashboards and reports within Flex and the Analytics Portal, and may see that no data is being loaded when viewing or editing dashboards and reports. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: We are investigating Flex Insights dashboard not loading for a subset of customers. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: We've become aware of a potential issue with Flex Insights. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Pine Cellular

incident_updates.body: The Pine Cellular network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 July 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 25 July 2023 at 10:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Pine Cellular US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France Voice and SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice and SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 25 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers and intermittent SMS delays delivering to and from France handsets via a subset of France longcodes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 02 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 31 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 03 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT
09 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 10 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT
16 August 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 17 August 2023 at 00:00 PDT
